definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: According to the model, limen of logarithm loudness is independent of intensity.
sentences.chinese: 这个模型认为，响度对数的辨别阈不随信号强度变化。

sentences.english: More ventilatory threshold intensity can make the brain cells tired.
sentences.chinese: 大于通气阈强度运动后易使中枢神经细胞产生疲劳。

sentences.english: Defibrillation energy requirements are typically higher than the patient's pain threshold.
sentences.chinese: 去纤颤器的能量要求通常要高于患者的痛阈。

sentences.english: When Hb reach the peak value, the curve of anaerobic limen moves left and there is an increase of aerobic ability.
sentences.chinese: 血红蛋白高峰时，无氧阈曲线右移，有氧能力提高。

sentences.english: Methods The rats' pain threshold was measured by tail-flick latency after oral administration of anti-pain powder.
sentences.chinese: 方法口服抗痛粉，用辐射热甩尾法测定大鼠痛阈。

sentences.english: Perceived strength of illusion was also measured in grids at suprathreshold contrast levels.
sentences.chinese: 感知强度幻想也衡量电网在阈上的对比度级别。

sentences.english: Once ELPs in solution reach a certain threshold temperature, they assemble into protein aggregates.
sentences.chinese: 当这种蛋白质达到阈温度时，便会聚集成聚合体。

sentences.english: Injection of anti-neurotensin serum(ANTS) reduced the pain threshold .
sentences.chinese: 注入抗神经降压素血清后，大鼠痛阈则明显降低。

definition: a cupboard or pantry to store
